item.title: How can i replace the current shotgun sounds with the HL2 ones?
item.dc:creator: crowbAr11
item.description:
okay. I found a way to manually replace the shotgun sounds.

Add the .vpk which you can find as an attachment to this post to the following folder:

Black Mesa -> bms -> addons -> workshop -> HERE

When you are ingame it may not work immediately, try restarting the game if it doesnt work.

For the name of that file I just chose a name of another vpk which was in that folder which replaced the shotgun sound, I dont know if the name is important.
572284088.zip (390 KB)
